health_data_information_systems_summary: Discussed the County's preparedness for the expected El Nino rains and the measures taken to mitigate the harmful effects of the anticipated phenomenon.
health_data_challenges: Budgetary constraints impacting disaster mitigation efforts.
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: Encouraging involvement of Members of the County Assembly in disaster management and response efforts.
health_evidence_base: Alerts received from the Metrological Department about extreme rainfall linked to the El Nino Phenomenon.
